product_name: The North Face Talia Tote - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed for everyday errands or weekend escapes, The North Face Talia Tote holds everything from your yoga mat to beach gear, plus your laptop. Innovative exterior sleeve accommodates a yoga mat (not included). Zippered, padded laptop sleeve accommodates most 15 in. laptops. Internal organization in zippered main compartment keeps small items tidy. Front zippered pocket and side stash pocket. Soft shoulder straps make carrying The North Face Talia Tote no sweat. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for everyday errands or weekend escapes, The North Face Talia Tote holds everything from your yoga mat to beach gear, plus your laptop.
